    Methods in org.apache.juneau.assertions that return Assertion
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Assertion
    Assertion.setMsg(String msg, Object... args)
    Allows you to override the assertion failure message.
    Assertion
    Assertion.setOut(PrintStream value)
    If an error occurs, send the error message to the specified stream instead of STDERR.
    Assertion
    Assertion.setSilent()
    Suppresses output to STDERR.
    Assertion
    Assertion.setStdOut()
    If an error occurs, send the error message to STDOUT instead of STDERR.
    Assertion
    Assertion.setThrowable(Class<? extends RuntimeException> value)
    If an error occurs, throw this exception instead of the standard AssertionError.
